Description: Vonage APIs help growing startups and agile enterprises enhance customer experience and realize new business outcomes at scale.
Name: Vonage

Methods.Name: List Calls
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details for all calls.

Methods.Name: List New Calls
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details for calls since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Call
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details of a single call.

Methods.Name: Get Number Details
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details associated with a telephone number.
